attributes.action: stop Staffordshire Bull Terrier hatred and treat all dogs the same
attributes.additional_details:
Staffies have such a bad name around the world due to there 'Lockjaw' but they are the same as any other dog so why so much hate?

Its all to do with the owner of the dog, not the dog itself, all dogs are the same, they have four legs and a waggy tail!

STOP THE STAFFIE HATE AND TREAT ALL DOGS THE SAME!
